cuisine_types.info: Traditional dishes featuring pasta, olive oil, and fresh ingredients
Elegant cuisine emphasizing fresh seafood, rice, and seasonal ingredients
Classic European cuisine known for rich sauces and refined techniques
Vibrant flavors with chilies, corn, beans, and fresh salsas
Aromatic spices and diverse regional cooking traditions
Ancient culinary traditions with diverse regional styles
Balance of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy flavors
Diverse melting pot cuisine with regional specialties
Healthy cuisine featuring olive oil, fresh vegetables, and seafood
Bold flavors with fermented ingredients and BBQ traditions
Vibrant Mediterranean cuisine with paella and tapas traditions
Fresh ingredients with feta, olives, and olive oil
Fusion of Mediterranean and Middle Eastern flavors
Fresh herbs and balance of flavors in every dish

Short-grain Italian rice perfect for risotto
Luxurious fungus with intense earthy aroma
Aged Italian hard cheese with nutty flavor
Rich chocolate with 70% cocoa content
High-fat dairy cream for sauces and desserts
Crisp lettuce variety perfect for salads
Small saltwater fish, often used in dressings

Mild fermented soybean paste
Versatile allium with sweet flavor when cooked
Swiss cheese with nutty, slightly sweet taste

Light sponge biscuits for tiramisu
Strong concentrated coffee

Creamy fruit rich in healthy fats

Warm spice from tree bark

kitchen_tools.description: Heavy-duty pan for high-heat searing
Essential 8-inch multipurpose knife
Surface for safe food preparation
Large pot for soups, stocks, and boiling
Medium pot for sauces and small batches
Wire tool for mixing and aerating
Set of bowls for prep and mixing
Flat pan for roasting and baking
Small ceramic dishes for individual portions
Electric appliance for pureeing and blending
Versatile appliance for chopping and mixing
Heavy-duty mixer for baking
Traditional stirring utensil
Gripping tool for flipping and serving
Deep spoon for serving soups and sauces
Perforated bowl for draining
Ridged pan for indoor grilling
Round-bottomed pan for stir-frying
Heavy pot for braising and baking
Slicing tool for uniform cuts
Tool for checking internal temperatures
Cylinder for rolling out dough
Brush for applying glazes and butter
Tool for removing citrus zest
Traditional grinding tool for spices
Handheld blender for soups and sauces
Fine grater for zesting and cheese
Heat-resistant tool for folding and scraping
Set of cups for accurate measurements
Set of spoons for precise seasoning

dishes.summary: A perfectly seared ribeye steak with herb butter, served with roasted vegetables.
dishes.steps: Season steak with salt and pepper | Heat cast iron pan until smoking | Sear 4 min each side for medium-rare | Rest 5 minutes | Top with herb butter

dishes.summary: Creamy Arborio rice infused with black truffle and aged Parmesan cheese.
dishes.steps: Toast rice in butter | Add white wine | Gradually add warm broth, stirring constantly | Finish with truffle oil and Parmesan

dishes.summary: Rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
dishes.steps: Melt chocolate and butter | Whisk eggs and sugar | Combine mixtures | Add flour | Bake at 425°F for 12 minutes

dishes.summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing and garlic croutons.
dishes.steps: Make dressing with anchovy, garlic, egg yolk, lemon | Toss romaine | Add croutons and Parmesan | Serve immediately

dishes.summary: Fresh Atlantic salmon with sweet white miso glaze and sesame seeds.
dishes.steps: Mix miso, mirin, sake, sugar | Marinate salmon 30 min | Broil 8-10 minutes | Garnish with sesame and scallions

dishes.summary: Caramelized onion soup topped with crusty bread and melted Gruyère cheese.
dishes.steps: Slowly caramelize onions 45 min | Add beef broth and wine | Simmer 15 min | Top with bread and cheese | Broil until bubbly

dishes.summary: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
dishes.steps: Whip mascarpone with sugar and egg yolks | Dip ladyfingers in espresso | Layer cream and cookies | Refrigerate 4 hours | Dust with cocoa

dishes.summary: Velvety smooth lobster soup with a hint of brandy and fresh tarragon.
dishes.steps: Sauté lobster shells with aromatics | Add tomato paste | Simmer with stock | Strain and blend | Finish with cream and brandy

dishes.summary: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, egg, and tamarind sauce.
dishes.steps: Soak rice noodles | Make tamarind sauce | Stir-fry shrimp and egg | Add noodles and sauce | Top with peanuts and lime

dishes.summary: Breaded chicken cutlet topped with marinara and melted mozzarella.
dishes.steps: Bread chicken cutlets | Pan-fry until golden | Top with marinara and cheese | Bake until cheese melts | Garnish with basil

dishes.summary: Seasoned ground beef in corn tortillas with fresh salsa and guacamole.
dishes.steps: Brown beef with spices | Warm tortillas | Make fresh salsa | Prepare guacamole | Assemble and serve

dishes.summary: Spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.
dishes.steps: Simmer broth with lemongrass and galangal | Add mushrooms | Add shrimp | Season with fish sauce and lime | Garnish with cilantro

dishes.summary: Silky vanilla custard with a caramelized sugar crust.
dishes.steps: Heat cream with vanilla | Whisk egg yolks with sugar | Combine and strain | Bake in water bath | Torch sugar topping

dishes.summary: Spicy Sichuan stir-fry with chicken, peanuts, and dried chilies.
dishes.steps: Marinate chicken | Make Kung Pao sauce | Stir-fry chicken | Add vegetables and peanuts | Toss with sauce

dishes.summary: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil with balsamic glaze.
dishes.steps: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes | Arrange alternating slices | Add fresh basil | Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic | Season with salt

dishes.summary: Classic French beef stew braised in red wine with mushrooms and pearl onions.
dishes.steps: Brown beef chunks | Sauté vegetables | Add wine and broth | Braise 2-3 hours | Add mushrooms and onions

dishes.summary: Fresh salmon and avocado rolled in seasoned rice and nori.
dishes.steps: Prepare sushi rice | Toast nori | Spread rice on nori | Add fillings and roll | Slice and serve with soy sauce

dishes.summary: Fresh avocado dip with lime, cilantro, and diced tomatoes.
dishes.steps: Mash ripe avocados | Add lime juice | Mix in onion and cilantro | Add diced tomatoes | Season with salt

dishes.summary: Creamy wild mushroom soup with thyme and a touch of sherry.
dishes.steps: Sauté mixed mushrooms | Add shallots and garlic | Pour in broth | Blend until smooth | Finish with cream and sherry

dishes.summary: Classic American dessert with spiced apple filling in flaky crust.
dishes.steps: Make pie dough | Slice and season apples | Fill pie shell | Add top crust | Bake at 375°F for 50 minutes

dishes.summary: Pan-seared duck breast with cherry gastrique and roasted root vegetables.
dishes.steps: Score duck skin | Season and sear skin-side down | Finish in oven | Rest 5 min | Serve with sauce

dishes.summary: Golden saffron-infused pasta with shrimp and white wine sauce.
dishes.steps: Steep saffron in warm wine | Cook pasta | Sauté shrimp | Combine with saffron sauce | Garnish with fresh herbs

dishes.summary: Colorful mixed vegetables with tofu in ginger-soy sauce.
dishes.steps: Prep all vegetables | Heat wok | Stir-fry harder veggies first | Add softer ones | Toss with sauce

dishes.summary: Italian-style cornmeal cake with lemon zest and ricotta cream.
dishes.steps: Mix polenta with butter and sugar | Fold in ricotta | Bake at 375°F until golden | Cool and dust with powdered sugar

dishes.summary: Traditional Spanish rice dish with chicken, rabbit, and green beans.
dishes.steps: Sauté meats | Cook vegetables | Add rice and broth | Simmer uncovered | Finish with saffron

dishes.summary: Crispy battered fish in soft tortillas with cabbage slaw and chipotle mayo.
dishes.steps: Batter and fry fish | Make slaw and sauce | Warm tortillas | Assemble with toppings | Serve with lime

dishes.summary: Provençal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.
dishes.steps: Prep vegetables | Sauté onions and garlic | Add vegetables in layers | Simmer with herbs | Serve hot or cold

dishes.summary: Vietnamese beef noodle soup with aromatic spices and fresh herbs.
dishes.steps: Simmer beef bones for broth | Toast spices | Cook rice noodles | Slice beef | Pour hot broth | Garnish with herbs

dishes.summary: Tender beef tenderloin wrapped in mushroom duxelles and pastry.
dishes.steps: Sear beef | Make duxelles | Wrap in pâté and pastry | Brush with egg wash | Bake until golden

dishes.summary: Crispy chickpea fritters seasoned with herbs and spices.
dishes.steps: Soak chickpeas | Blend with herbs and spices | Form patties | Deep fry until golden | Serve with tahini sauce

dishes.summary: Tender chicken in a creamy tomato and spice sauce with aromatic flavors.
dishes.steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices | Grill or bake | Make tomato cream sauce | Combine and simmer | Serve with rice

dishes.summary: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and San Marzano tomatoes.
dishes.steps: Prepare pizza dough | Spread sauce | Add cheese and tomatoes | Top with basil | Bake at 450°F

dishes.summary: Rustic French chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms and pearl onions.
dishes.steps: Brown chicken | Sauté vegetables | Add wine and broth | Braise 1.5 hours | Add mushrooms

dishes.summary: Greek phyllo pie filled with spinach, feta, and aromatic herbs.
dishes.steps: Sauté spinach | Mix with feta and herbs | Layer phyllo with butter | Add filling | Bake until golden

dishes.summary: Tender shrimp in a garlic and white wine butter sauce over pasta.
dishes.steps: Cook pasta | Sauté garlic | Add shrimp and cook | Deglaze with wine | Finish with butter and parsley | Combine

dishes.summary: Roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese and topped with sauce.
dishes.steps: Roast peppers | Peel and stuff with cheese | Make sauce | Pour over peppers | Bake until bubbly

dishes.summary: Southeast Asian coconut spiced noodle soup with shrimp and fish cake.
dishes.steps: Make coconut curry broth | Cook noodles | Add shrimp and fish cake | Pour broth | Garnish with herbs

dishes.summary: Italian-style cheesecake made with fresh ricotta and hints of lemon.
dishes.steps: Make crust | Blend ricotta with sugar | Add eggs and lemon | Pour into crust | Bake slowly | Cool and chill

dishes.summary: Aromatic Vietnamese beef broth with rice noodles and fresh herbs.
dishes.steps: Simmer beef bones with spices | Cook noodles | Slice beef thin | Arrange in bowls | Pour hot broth | Garnish

dishes.summary: Crispy Italian pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cream and chocolate chips.
dishes.steps: Make pastry dough | Fry tubes | Make ricotta filling | Fill cannoli | Dust with powdered sugar

dishes.summary: Creamy Parmesan sauce coating tender egg fettuccine noodles.
dishes.steps: Cook pasta | Melt butter and cream | Add Parmesan cheese | Toss pasta in sauce | Season and serve

dishes.summary: Fresh fish marinated in lime juice with onions, cilantro, and peppers.
dishes.steps: Dice fresh fish | Cover with lime juice | Add vegetables | Marinate 20 min | Serve chilled

dishes.summary: Japanese noodle soup with soft-boiled egg, pork, and aromatic broth.
dishes.steps: Make broth overnight | Cook noodles | Boil eggs | Marinate pork | Assemble bowls with toppings

dishes.summary: Greek eggplant and meat lasagna with creamy béchamel topping.
dishes.steps: Fry eggplant | Brown meat | Make béchamel | Layer ingredients | Bake until golden

dishes.summary: Korean mixed rice bowl with vegetables, protein, and spicy gochujang sauce.
dishes.steps: Cook rice | Prepare vegetables separately | Arrange on rice | Add protein | Pour sauce | Mix at table

dishes.summary: Provençal fish stew with saffron and fennel served with crusty bread.
dishes.steps: Sauté vegetables | Add fish and shellfish | Simmer with broth and saffron | Serve with rouille and bread

dishes.summary: Silky Italian cream custard with berry compote and fresh mint.
dishes.steps: Heat cream with vanilla | Dissolve gelatin | Pour into molds | Chill overnight | Serve with berries

dishes.summary: Hungarian beef stew with paprika, onions, and potatoes.
dishes.steps: Brown beef | Sauté onions | Add paprika | Simmer with broth | Add potatoes | Cook until tender

dishes.summary: Japanese crispy battered vegetables and shrimp served with dipping sauce.
dishes.steps: Make tempura batter | Dip vegetables | Deep fry until golden | Serve immediately with sauce

dishes.summary: Indian fragrant rice dish with marinated meat and aromatic spices.
dishes.steps: Marinate meat in yogurt | Cook rice partially | Layer meat and rice | Seal and bake | Serve with yogurt

dishes.summary: Vietnamese fresh rice paper rolls with vegetables and herbs.
dishes.steps: Soften rice paper | Assemble vegetables | Wrap tightly | Serve with peanut sauce

dishes.summary: Alsatian sauerkraut with sausages, bacon, and potatoes.
dishes.steps: Cook sauerkraut with wine | Brown meats | Layer with vegetables | Braise until tender

dishes.summary: Chinese rice porridge served with toppings and condiments.
dishes.steps: Simmer rice in broth for hours | Stir occasionally | Serve with toppings like egg and scallions

dishes.summary: French snails in garlic and herb butter sauce.
dishes.steps: Prepare escargot shells | Make herb butter | Fill shells | Bake at 450°F | Serve hot with bread

dishes.summary: Japanese savory cabbage pancake topped with sauce and bonito flakes.
dishes.steps: Mix batter with cabbage | Cook on griddle | Flip carefully | Add sauce and toppings

dishes.summary: Crispy tortilla chips loaded with cheese, jalapeños, and toppings.
dishes.steps: Layer chips and cheese | Bake until melted | Add jalapeños | Top with sour cream and guacamole

dishes.summary: French bean and meat casserole slow-cooked with herbs.
dishes.steps: Soak beans overnight | Brown meats | Combine in pot | Bake slowly for hours

dishes.summary: Asian grilled meat skewers with peanut dipping sauce.
dishes.steps: Marinate meat | Thread on skewers | Grill until cooked | Make peanut sauce | Serve hot

dishes.summary: Italian braised veal shank with vegetables and wine sauce.
dishes.steps: Sear veal shank | Sauté vegetables | Add wine and broth | Braise 2+ hours | Make gremolata

dishes.summary: Chinese roasted duck with crispy skin served with thin pancakes.
dishes.steps: Prepare and hang duck | Roast slowly | Baste with glaze | Carve and serve with sauce and pancakes

dishes.summary: Italian-style meatballs simmered in rich marinara sauce.
dishes.steps: Mix and form meatballs | Brown in pan | Simmer in sauce | Serve over pasta

dishes.summary: Japanese rice bowl topped with meat or seafood and sauce.
dishes.steps: Cook rice | Prepare protein and vegetables | Simmer in sauce | Pour over rice | Serve hot

dishes.summary: Latin American pastry pockets filled with seasoned meat.
dishes.steps: Make pastry dough | Prepare filling | Stuff and seal | Bake until golden | Serve with sauce

dishes.summary: Rich Mediterranean fish stew with garlic mayonnaise.
dishes.steps: Make saffron broth | Add fish layered | Simmer gently | Make rouille | Serve with bread

dishes.summary: New Orleans stew with okra, sausage, and seafood.
dishes.steps: Make dark roux | Sauté vegetables | Add stock | Simmer meats | Add okra | Serve over rice

dishes.summary: New England creamy soup with clams and potatoes.
dishes.steps: Steam clams | Sauté vegetables | Make roux | Add cream | Add clams | Simmer gently

dishes.summary: Indian spiced chicken roasted in clay oven with yogurt marinade.
dishes.steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices | Grill or roast | Serve with lemon and mint

dishes.summary: German grilled sausage served with tangy fermented cabbage.
dishes.steps: Warm sauerkraut | Grill bratwurst | Toast buns | Assemble with toppings

dishes.summary: Spanish cold tomato soup served chilled with fresh vegetables.
dishes.steps: Blend tomatoes with vegetables | Season | Chill | Serve with croutons and toppings

dishes.summary: French salad with tuna, eggs, and vegetables with anchovy dressing.
dishes.steps: Boil eggs and potatoes | Arrange vegetables | Add tuna | Drizzle with anchovy dressing

dishes.summary: Mexican rolled tortillas filled with meat and topped with sauce.
dishes.steps: Make sauce | Fill tortillas | Roll and arrange | Cover with cheese and sauce | Bake until bubbly

dishes.summary: Vietnamese sandwich with pâté, pickled vegetables, and herbs.
dishes.steps: Prepare fillings | Toast bread | Spread pâté |Layer vegetables | Serve with hot sauce

dishes.summary: French rustic savory pie with vegetables and cheese.
dishes.steps: Make pastry | Prepare filling | Arrange in center | Fold edges | Bake until golden

dishes.summary: Flaky baked salmon with a zesty lemon-garlic butter sauce.
dishes.steps: Preheat oven to 400F | Season salmon with salt, pepper, and garlic | Bake for 15 mins | Squeeze fresh lemon over top | Garnish with parsley

dishes.summary: Creamy, rich parmesan sauce over tender pasta and grilled chicken breast.
dishes.steps: Boil pasta until al dente | Sauté chicken until cooked through | Simmer heavy cream and butter | Whisk in parmesan cheese | Toss chicken and pasta in sauce

dishes.summary: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and sweet basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.
dishes.steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella evenly | Arrange alternately on a platter | Tuck basil leaves between slices | Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze | Sprinkle with flaky sea salt

dishes.summary: An elegant Italian dessert made with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
dishes.steps: Whip egg yolks and sugar | Fold in mascarpone and whipped cream | Dip ladyfingers briefly in cold espresso | Layer ladyfingers and cream mixture | Dust heavily with cocoa powder and chill

dishes.summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, red pepper flakes, and a poached egg.
dishes.steps: Toast sourdough slice | Mash avocado with lime juice and salt | Poach one egg for 3 minutes | Spread avocado on toast and top with egg | Sprinkle red pepper flakes

dishes.summary: Arborio rice slowly cooked in broth with earthy mushrooms and parmesan.
dishes.steps: Sauté onions and mushrooms | Add arborio rice and toast slightly | Deglaze with white wine | Add warm broth one ladle at a time while stirring | Stir in butter and parmesan

dishes.summary: Marinated skirt steak in warm corn tortillas with diced onions and cilantro.
dishes.steps: Marinate beef in citrus and spices | Grill steak on high heat until charred | Let rest and chop into small cubes | Warm corn tortillas on a skillet | Assemble with beef, onion, and cilantro

dishes.summary: Wood-fired pizza dough topped with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
dishes.steps: Stretch pizza dough into a circle | Spread crushed tomatoes evenly | Add torn fresh mozzarella | Bake at 500F for 10-12 mins | Top with fresh basil leaves

dishes.summary: Rich beef broth packed with caramelized onions and topped with a cheesy crouton.
dishes.steps: Slice onions and caramelize slowly in butter | Add beef broth and simmer | Ladle into oven-safe bowls | Top with toasted baguette and gruyere cheese | Broil until cheese is bubbly and golden

dishes.summary: Dense, gooey chocolate brownies with a crinkly top.
dishes.steps: Melt butter and chocolate chips together | Whisk eggs and sugar until frothy | Fold chocolate mixture into eggs | Gently fold in flour and cocoa powder | Bake at 350F for 25 mins

dishes.summary: Plump shrimp tossed in a garlic, butter, and white wine sauce over linguine.
dishes.steps: Boil linguine until tender | Sauté garlic and red pepper flakes in butter | Add shrimp and cook until pink | Pour in white wine and simmer | Toss with pasta and fresh parsley

dishes.summary: Crisp cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, kalamata olives, and feta block.
dishes.steps: Chop cucumbers and tomatoes into large chunks | Slice red onions thinly | Combine in a bowl with olives | Dress with olive oil and oregano | Top with a large slice of feta cheese

dishes.summary: Poached eggs and Canadian bacon on English muffins, smothered in hollandaise.
dishes.steps: Toast English muffin halves | Sear Canadian bacon in a skillet | Poach eggs in simmering water | Whisk egg yolks, lemon, and melted butter for hollandaise | Assemble and pour sauce over top

dishes.summary: Fall-off-the-bone tender pork ribs slathered in a sweet and smoky barbecue sauce.
dishes.steps: Remove membrane from ribs | Apply dry rub generously | Wrap in foil and bake at 275F for 3 hours | Unwrap and brush with BBQ sauce | Broil for 5 mins until sticky

dishes.summary: A dense, rich, and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
dishes.steps: Mix graham cracker crumbs with butter and press into pan | Beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla | Add eggs one at a time | Pour filling over crust | Bake in a water bath at 325F for 1 hour

dishes.summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with egg, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
dishes.steps: Soak rice noodles until pliable | Sauté chicken and scramble an egg in the wok | Add noodles and tamarind sauce | Toss with bean sprouts and green onions | Garnish with crushed peanuts and lime

dishes.summary: Toasted baguette slices topped with a fresh mix of diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
dishes.steps: Slice and toast baguette | Rub toasted bread with a raw garlic clove | Dice tomatoes and mix with basil, olive oil, and salt | Spoon mixture onto bread | Serve immediately

dishes.summary: Crispy tofu cubes and mixed vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger glaze.
dishes.steps: Press and cube extra firm tofu | Pan-fry tofu until golden and crispy | Stir-fry broccoli, bell peppers, and snap peas | Whisk soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and cornstarch | Combine everything and simmer until sauce thickens

dishes.summary: Thick and creamy soup packed with chopped clams, potatoes, and savory bacon.
dishes.steps: Cook bacon until crispy and remove from pot | Sauté onions and celery in bacon fat | Add diced potatoes and clam juice | Simmer until potatoes are tender | Stir in heavy cream and chopped clams

dishes.summary: Fluffy, golden pancakes served with butter and warm maple syrup.
dishes.steps: Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt | Combine buttermilk, egg, and melted butter | Fold wet ingredients into dry | Pour batter onto a hot griddle | Flip when bubbles form and serve

dishes.summary: Juicy, pan-seared pork chops basted with thyme and garlic butter.
dishes.steps: Season pork chops generously | Heat skillet with oil until hot | Sear chops 4 mins per side | Add butter, garlic, and thyme to pan | Baste chops continuously until cooked

dishes.summary: Silky smooth Yukon gold potatoes mashed with heavy cream and butter.
dishes.steps: Peel and cube potatoes | Boil in salted water until fork-tender | Drain and return to pot | Mash thoroughly | Fold in warm heavy cream and melted butter

dishes.summary: A classic deep-dish pie filled with spiced apples and a flaky butter crust.
dishes.steps: Line pie dish with pastry dough | Toss sliced apples with sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg | Fill pie crust with apple mixture | Cover with lattice top crust | Bake at 375F until golden and bubbly

dishes.summary: Crispy fried cod fillets served alongside thick-cut potato chips and tartar sauce.
dishes.steps: Cut potatoes into thick fries and fry until golden | Whisk flour, spices, and cold beer for batter | Dip cod fillets into batter | Fry fish until crispy | Serve with lemon and tartar sauce

dishes.summary: A savory egg custard with wilted spinach and feta cheese in a shortcrust pastry.
dishes.steps: Blind bake the pie crust | Sauté spinach until wilted and drain excess liquid | Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper | Layer spinach and feta in the crust | Pour egg mixture over top and bake

dishes.summary: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, ricotta, and melted mozzarella cheese.
dishes.steps: Simmer ground beef with crushed tomatoes and herbs | Mix ricotta with egg and parmesan | Layer meat sauce, noodles, and cheese mixture in a pan | Top with final layer of mozzarella | Bake covered for 45 mins, then uncover until browned

dishes.summary: Mashed Hass avocados mixed with fresh lime juice, jalapeño, and cilantro.
dishes.steps: Halve and pit avocados | Scoop into a bowl and mash lightly | Dice tomatoes, onions, and jalapeños | Fold veggies and cilantro into avocado | Season with lime juice and salt

dishes.summary: Roasted marinated chicken chunks in a spiced, creamy tomato curry.
dishes.steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices | Broil chicken until charred | Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pot | Add tomato purée and simmer | Stir in heavy cream and cooked chicken

dishes.summary: Elbow pasta tossed in a rich cheddar and gruyere sauce, baked with a breadcrumb topping.
dishes.steps: Boil macaroni | Make a roux with butter and flour | Whisk in milk until thickened | Melt in sharp cheddar and gruyere | Mix with pasta, top with breadcrumbs, and bake

dishes.summary: A silky, chilled Italian cream dessert flavored with real vanilla bean.
dishes.steps: Bloom gelatin in cold water | Heat heavy cream, sugar, and scraped vanilla bean | Whisk gelatin into warm cream until dissolved | Pour into ramekins | Chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours
